changes: Reasoning: A single large area rug is superior for the 'Cozy Retreat' style. It unifies the bed and sofa into a single visual block, anchoring the main relaxation zone and making the space feel more cohesive and comfortable than two separate small rugs.
Refined the descriptions for chairs and artwork to be more specific to their function within the new layout.

refined_placements.bed_1: Centered against the south wall, between the two low windows, directly opposite the main entrance.
refined_placements.nightstand_1: Positioned to the left of the bed's headboard, against the south wall.
refined_placements.nightstand_2: Positioned to the right of the bed's headboard, against the south wall.
refined_placements.sofa_1: Placed at the foot of bed_1, facing the bed's headboard to create a single, unified lounging block in the center of the room.
refined_placements.table_1: Set against the west wall, in the space between the kitchen area and the main lounging block.
refined_placements.chair_1: Tucked under the east side of table_1, facing the west wall.
refined_placements.chair_2: Tucked under the south side of table_1, facing north.
refined_placements.artwork_1: Mounted on the south wall, centered above the headboard of bed_1.
refined_placements.artwork_2: Mounted on the west wall, centered above table_1 to define the dining nook.
refined_placements.plant_1: Placed in the southeast corner of the room, next to nightstand_2.
refined_placements.lamp_1: Positioned in the southwest corner of the room, providing ambient light to the sofa and bed area.
refined_placements.area_rug_1: Centered under the bed and sofa block. Place it so it sits under the bottom two-thirds of the bed and extends far enough to have the front legs of the sofa resting on it, unifying the entire lounging area.
